program.name: Cloud Infrastructure
program.description: Cloud Infrastructure program delivers outcomes for infrastructure needed to carry out the work in the platform, and in a standard way, for App Product Teams.

depends_on.name: Azure Kubernetes Service support for GAIA
Adoption of CloudOS capabilities & key features grows
Standards are more widely implemented within the platform
R@S: Observability/Monitoring via new stack put in place, lowering costly dependency on legacy tools and services in regions
R@S: Prerequisites for R13N - Networking and AWS Account Configuration/Management are put in place reducing the need to manually wait on Network Provisioning
R@S: Service to Service Allow Listing supports efficient, repeatable, processes for future regions
R@S: Configuration Management externalizes configuration, enabling it to take place outside of the application
R@S: Dacloud Service Support (aka convergence) allows Kubernetes to become our primary deployment mechanism
Formalize UCP polices and governance to create a stable and scalable platform for regionalization
Reduce cloud deployment failure rate caused by pipeline issues
Provide a delightful employee experience by improving the network performance with Multi Cloud Edge Expansion (from 5 to 10 regions globally)
R@S: System Model Adoption and Dependency Tree Generation based on System Model
CloudOS Compute to Autodesk Compute Platform (ACP) Migration
